Item.Value: Hi! Welcome to the Blue Hare Inn. I'm $Character_10$. I hope the road wasn't too bad to get here.
Hello $^$. I hope you're well today.
You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.
Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?
Hello, what can I do for you?.[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel]
Nice to see you hon, we don't get too many customers on cold days like this. Why don't you treat yourself to something warm at the bar?

Sometimes, days like these remind me of when $Character_9$ and I first met. It was the dead of winter and he'd just come into the tavern I was performing at, bundled up in his coat. There was something about him that caught my eye immediately.
You know, I kind of love the rain now that I'm not on the road anymore. I hated it back then though. Now? It's nice to be warm inside and watch it fall.
Huh, rain? Guess we're not going to have too many customers tonight, huh?

Best be careful if you're gonna go exploring hon, I was out on the edge of the forest the other day, just minding my own business when I saw something creeping around. I didn't get a good look at it, but it didn't seem like a good idea to stick around.
